creator: hyqiao@bmpcoe.org
text:
info.pattern.getPattern() method always return null. I checked the source code( 
MatchActionProcessor.java), the info.pattern is never assigned a value. 

so I add line :

info.pattern = pattern;

in the processMatches(InputStream input, OutputStream output) method and fixed 
the problem. 

Haiying

creator: dfs@apache.org
text: This was the same as bug 476 which I just fixed and closed.
Closing bug because the fix was easy to test.
creator: dfs@apache.org
